trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_SEQ_00<tab>The bashful air ill suits a Roegadyn but Ahldfoet has it nevertheless, wearing the sheepishness like an incommodious singlet.

TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_SEQ_01<tab>Ahldfoet has promised a favor to a mother he met at a port of call, one whose entreaties seem to stir the poet in him. Take her letter to Wiltswys at Camp Skull Valley.
TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_SEQ_02<tab>Expecting a heartwarming scene, you hand Wiltswys the letter from her mother. Alas, you are sent away with a flea in your ear instead. Ah, family matters.

TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_AHLDFOET_000_000<tab>Ahoy, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It clean slipped my mind the last time, but I've another thing to ask of ye. My bearings are lively on the water, but on land─well, I'm what you landlubbers call <var 1A 02 /var>at sea<var 1A 01 /var>. Got a letter that needs delivering and you're the <var 08 E905 ((maid)) ((man)) /var> for it.

TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_AHLDFOET_000_001<tab>I went ashore on some rock on the voyage in, and a faded petticoat comes up to me, says she got a daughter in Camp Skull Valley what she hadn't seen in years. Had tears in her eyes─pretty eyes too, for a woman past her childin' years. She must've been a real beauty in her day.

TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_AHLDFOET_000_002<tab>Always had a soft spot for tawny eyes...mayhap because the sea is a green-eyed virago and the skies, her sisters, have eyes blue and red, grey and black... Well, this daughter of hers goes by Wiltswys. You'll take the letter to her?
TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_WILTSWYS_000_010<tab>Greetings, adventurer. They said you were looking for me?
TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_WILTSWYS_000_011<tab>A letter from Mama! I haven't heard from her in so long... She never answered my letters. No, stay, for I'll have a reply to send!

TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_WILTSWYS_000_012<tab>What the...! Oh, the stone-hearted, grasping hag! Wouldn't let me take so much as a hunk of dried fish when I left the island, and now she wants gil? That...that <var 1A 02 /var>succubus<var 1A 01 /var>!

TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_WILTSWYS_000_013<tab>You think me cold? Well, fie on what you think! I wanted something better than tilling salty fields and spilling small fry out the nets, and occasionally taking a passing sailor into my bed for more o' the same! She'll receive no reply from me. Thank you for your service, and good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> to you!
